info.description: RESTful API for IPL Backend Service with menu management
info.title: IPL Backend Service API

post.description: Create custom billings for specified user IDs or all penghuni users if user_ids is empty. Requires auth-token cookie.

parameters.description: Bulk billing request with month and year
parameters.name: request

post.description: Create monthly billings for specified user IDs or all penghuni users if user_ids is empty. Requires auth-token cookie.

parameters.description: Bulk billing request with month and year
parameters.name: request

post.description: Receive payment gateway webhook and process payment confirmation

get.description: Retrieve all billing penghuni records without pagination or search
Get billing data for penghuni users. Supports pagination and search by `q` (nama_penghuni or user ID).
get.summary: Get billing penghuni list with summed nominals

get.description: Get all master menus with pagination

post.description: Create a new master menu with the provided information

get.description: Get master menu information by ID
Get list of menus accessible by a specific user ID

post.description: Create a DOKU payment link for multiple billing records by IDs
post.summary: Create payment link for multiple billings

post.description: Create a DOKU payment link for a billing record by ID

get.description: Get all role menus with pagination and relations

post.description: Create a new role menu with the provided information

get.description: Get role menu information by ID with master menus and roles

delete.description: Delete role menu by ID and its associations

post.description: Attach a master menu to a role menu with optional ordering
post.summary: Attach master menu to role menu

404.description: Role menu or master menu not found

delete.description: Detach a master menu from a role menu
delete.summary: Detach master menu from role menu

post.description: Attach a role to a role menu with optional ordering

delete.description: Detach a role from a role menu

get.description: Get all role menus associated with a specific role
get.summary: Get role menus by role ID

get.description: Get list of all users with role type "penghuni"
Get detailed user information by profile ID
get.summary: Get user detail by profile ID

billing_ids.description: Array of billing IDs to create payment link for

nominal.description: Total nominal amount (summed per billing period)
